channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- My wpdb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- My wpdb

item.title: CVE-2022-1578|2024-08-03T00:10:03.399Z -- unknown -- my%20wpdb
item.description: The My wpdb WordPress plugin before 2.5 is missing CSRF check when running SQL queries, which could allow attacker to make a logged in admin run arbitrary SQL query via a CSRF attack
